name: KLURE!
description:
is a retro game. Inspired by the many different high scoring arcade games, of the early '80s. The game includes infinite levels of old school arcade action. Across three different modes, and unlockable difficulties!

Makes for a great coffee break game. With its simple to learn controls, and general gameplay that is easy to understand!

- Jump on tiles , to match the probes  colors. In order to complete levels!

- Collect items , to earn extra points. Also power-ups might appear to give you a boost!

- But, avoid these guys... 

Game includes a seamless tutorial, that will go into more detail. Without spoiling some of the hidden depth of the game!

Features!

  • Colorblind Mode
  • Xbox Controller Support
  • A Bunch of Tweakable Options - too many to list!
  • 3 Unlockable Game Modes - each one generates levels differently!
  • 3 Unlockable Difficulties - can be toggled on/off, and combined together!
  • 24 High Scores Saved - for each Game Mode and Difficulty combination!

As a note, the game will not receive any further content updates. As it is feature complete! 

But it will be patched if any bugs, or exploits are found. In which case you can email me at: j.noodlerat@gmail.com
